newsitem.title: FRANCE: IPSOS/Le Point say French poll due 1630 GMT.
newsitem.headline: IPSOS/Le Point say French poll due 1630 GMT.

text.p: Sources at polling organisation IPSOS and French weekly Le Point said they would publish a poll of voters' intentions in the upcoming May/June parliamentary elections.
The source at Le Point said it would be released at 1630 GMT on Thursday.
Traders said talk of a poll yet to be published, which showed a very slim majority for the ruling centre-right coalition, had hit French financial markets late on Thursday.
